code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='https://frozen-bastion-35916.herokuapp.com/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var create=function create(phoneObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,phoneObject);};var delrio=function delrio(delid){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(delid));};export default{getAll:getAll,delrio:delrio,create:create};
